Ever Keep a Proper Perspective of Responsibility. --Great consideration must be exercised in the work that we undertake. We are not to assume large burdens 
                                                                           236
in the care of infant children. This work is being done by others. We have a special work in caring for and educating the children more advanced in years. Let families who can do so adopt the little ones, and they will receive a blessing in so doing.--Testimonies, vol. 6, pp. 246, 247.
